member.name: CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM
member.summary: The CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM structure contains information about a key container parameter. This structure is used with the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM.dwParam
member.summary: Identifies the parameter. For possible values, see the dwParam parameter of the function.

member.name: CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM.pbData
member.summary: The address of a buffer that contains the parameter data. For more information, see the pbData parameter of the function.

member.name: CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM.cbData
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the pbData buffer.

member.name: CRYPT_KEY_PROV_PARAM.dwFlags
member.summary: This member is reserved for future use and is zero.
